name: Artefact Explorer
description: In 2070, every archeologist in the world were forced to stop their activity because they could not find anything. Because of the WWIII of 2036, looter use the anarchy of the world to explore and steal every piece of history that we have not discovered before. To give them back something to explore, scientists searched how to go back in time in order to the archeologist can directly go through the history.
